root.name: Laser Lords
root.description: OverviewLaser Lords is an adventure game developed by Spinnaker Software and published by Philips Interactive for the CD-i platform.PlotIn Laser Lords the player takes on the role of a reluctant hero which is given seven lives to save the universe from Sarpedon. Sarpedon is trying to locate a crystal called a condensation crystal which he can use to shrink down the universe to a small ball.
